short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns any list into a deletable item list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of boring old unmodifiable lists on websites? With this extension, now you can rearrange and delete lists to your hearts content! Just double press Shift, hover over the list of items you want to modify, and make the list what you want it to be. Delete unnecessary items, rearrange your favorite items to the top, even press Ctrl+Z to undoing removal.
